channel.title: In need of general question answering! ASAP
channel.description: Hey guys, I just have some basic questions to ask someone who is willing to help, I'm a bit new to the coding world so any help would be much appreciated! If your willing to help send me a message on here and I can give you my skype name. It's not complicated stuff, I just am a little confused on something's. Thanks.

item.title: In need of general question answering! ASAP
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

xx pwns xx:

Hmmmm the IDE looks very very confusing but I guess I’ll get it a shot! If I have any other questions I’ll just lost back! I appreciate all the help guys!

lol it seriously depends if you wanna be fixing compiler errors for days and taking two hours to write code that should take half and hour to write then balls to you i guess

Read full topic
item.source: In need of general question answering! ASAP

item.title: In need of general question answering! ASAP
item.dc:creator: @mattr91 mattr91
item.description:
@mattr91 wrote:

xx pwns xx:

Well my question is… When I open my source and client folder and try to open a java file it doesn’t let me, it brings up a prompt menu asking if I want my computer to find a software to run with it. I know I needed jdk so I downloaded it but the files still do not open. No java files open at all. I can’t even edit the IP in client.java because it ask me to open with another program, is there anyway to fix this? Is there something I’m doing wrong? If so any help would be appreciated!

Download notepad++ it’s what I used to use unless there is a better editor out

Read full topic

item.source: In need of general question answering! ASAP

item.title: In need of general question answering! ASAP
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

An integrated development environment (IDE) or interactive development environment is a software application that provides comprehensive facilities to computer programmers for software development. An IDE normally consists of a source code editor, build automation tools and a debugger. Most modern IDEs offer Intelligent code completion features.
so in english: it makes your programming life A HELL of a lot easier.

programming without an ide is like having no eyes and being told to find your way somewhere.

you don’t wanna deal with compilation errors?
you wanna be able to navigate to files with ease?
you wanna be able to run, compile, debug, and edit your server all in one place?
you wanna be able to auto-format (make your code tidy automatically) your code?
you wanna be able to ???

JOIN US

http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/eclipse-ide-java-developers/keplersr1

Read full topic
item.source: In need of general question answering! ASAP

item.title: In need of general question answering! ASAP
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Don’t post unless you intend to help the original poster with the problem at hand. Further arguments/spam will result in infractions.
Good luck solving your issue, OP.

Read full topic
item.source: In need of general question answering! ASAP

item.title: In need of general question answering! ASAP
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

What a waste of a thread.

OP: The reason you’re getting that message is because you haven’t set any defaults for the .java file type. Any text editor in the world can read .java files. You can also right click it and press edit, and it will open in your regular notepad.
I suggest getting a rich text editor like Notepad++, or even better to get an IDE (Integrated Development Environment) to make your life easier. The most common one is Eclipse (imo) and can be found here.

Read full topic
item.source: In need of general question answering! ASAP

item.description:

Thanks for the advice guys! I’ll def try everything y’all are suggesting! But one question is, and disregard the lack of common sense but what a IDE ? A type of text editor?

Read full topic
item.source: In need of general question answering! ASAP

item.title: In need of general question answering! ASAP
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

It just means that a Default Program has not been set to open up Java files. You can use Notepad if you don’t want to download anything, or alternatively you can download an IDE like Dan suggested. Or, if you don’t want/need an IDE, you can always download the superior text editor Sublime Text.

Read full topic
